scripts.tests: env-cmd -f dev.env npx playwright test e2e/
scripts.tests:debug: env-cmd -f dev.env npx playwright test e2e/ --debug --project=chromium
scripts.tests:ch: env-cmd -f dev.env npx playwright test e2e/  --project=chromium
scripts.tests:ff: env-cmd -f dev.env  npx playwright test e2e/  --project=firefox
scripts.tests:wk: env-cmd -f dev.env  npx playwright test e2e/  --project=webkit
